mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user ( user_id, user_password, user_email, user_level ) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_email}, #{user_level} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_password = user_password, user_email = user_email, user_level = user_level
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_user ( user_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE, user_password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, user_level INT DEFAULT 9, user_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL )
